Text: Israe̩l chʼikeli ki hidu kʼi arʼe̩ro-wñ.
Okpo achʼabo ku ma dodo Samaria ofe
I chʼe-Samaria, ma fʼonu-wñ ko̩da bʼo̩ te̩,
O Israe̩l, uwe̩ te̩tadure akwʼiko Gibe̩a le̩;
E̩gba ki dʼumi e̩do̩ nako̩ ma o̩la;
Ifraim la dab ole okuno̩ agbadufu ku ma kʼo̩ uko̩lo̩
Me̩ ki fʼe̩wñ gbe̩ ñw o̩la-me̩ ef o̩kpakpa,
